alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 5:18PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Luna County through 600 PM MDT... At 517 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sunshine, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Deming, Sunshine, Rock Hound State Park and Spring Canyon State Park. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 70 and 100. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
